meanings.definition: A person who investigates jointly with others.
meanings.sent1: The coinvestigators worked together to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The coinvestigators collaborated on the research project.
meanings.sent3: The coinvestigators found a clue and high-fived in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The coinvestigators were like detectives on a mission.
meanings.sent5: The coinvestigators shared their findings to crack the case.

meanings.sent1: The team of coinvestigators explored the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The coinvestigators pooled their resources to gather evidence.
meanings.sent3: The coinvestigators joked around while collecting clues.
meanings.sent4: The coinvestigators were a united force in uncovering the truth.
meanings.sent5: The coinvestigators were like a squad of detectives on a mission.
